sentences.en: "Temperdysregulation with dysphoria" is the work group's proposed solution.
sentences.cn: “脾气调节障碍烦躁型”是工作组提议的解决办法。

sentences.en: Cold colors are applicable to dysphoria, irascibility, terror and fear as well as mania, epilepsy, etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于烦躁易怒 、 失眠惊恐诸证以及狂证 、 癫证等.

sentences.en: Results The patients'pain and dysphoria were alleviated and set up correct understanding about the disease.
sentences.cn: 结果疼痛减轻,心理焦虑减轻,建立了对疾病正确的认识.

sentences.en: Transsexualism is a severe gender dysphoria, for which transsexual operation is an important therapy.
sentences.cn: 易性病是一种心理障碍性疾病, 变性手术是易性病的重要治疗方法.

trans.tran_cn: 病理性心境恶劣，烦躁不安，躁动，烦满，躁扰
trans.tran_en: a feeling of being ill at ease
